summary: came back home today, and guess what — mom made my favorite, fish curry! it was so good, just the perfect comfort food. after that, i got back to working on my project. made some solid progress today. the project is called 'human digital edition' and i even submitted my work to sir. feeling productive! my driving classes are going well too. and omg — i irritated my brother so much today, i even poured water on him! it was hilarious, but just fun sibling stuff. i love messing with him, but honestly, i love him so much. ending the day on a happy note. good night!
